law.text: The Cabinet for Health and Family Services shall adopt administrative regulations pursuant to KRS Chapter 13A for the purpose of carrying out the provisions of this chapter.
law.history: Amended 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 99, sec. 429, effective June 20, 2005. -- Amended 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 426, sec. 380, effective July 15, 1998. -- Created 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 369, sec. 3, effective July 13, 1990.
